name: Backslaan
description:
This is my first game, I made all the models myself. pls give your feedback if you want :)

===========================================================

You heard about a house in a small town, the house was of a family of 3, a father, mother and a daughter. After the mother passed away the father also passed away in a car crash, the daughter was nowhere to be found. The house seems to be abandoned now, only reports are coming in of sound inside the house. As the thrill seeker you are you take your flashlight and enter the house to find out what’s happening
